page.title: 07HOUSE SIZE & CARS IN IXWORTH
page.content:
HOME SIZE: ---------- Living room: 60% have 1,32% have 2, 7% have 3, 1% more than 3 Bedrooms: 4% have 1, 22% have 2, 45% have 3, 26% have 4, 2% have 5, 1% more than 5 Kitchens: 100% have 1 kitchen. Bathrooms: 84% have 1,16% more than 1 Utility Room:Only 36% have one.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
CARS & GARAGES: --------------- 23% of households have no car. 48% of households have 1 car. 26% of households have 2 cars. 3% have 3 or more cars. 20% of households with cars do not have garage facilities.
